events.message: The applicant has submitted the personal loan application aiming to cover upcoming medical expenses, providing all initial forms and contact details.
The loan application was reviewed and categorised under Personal Loan due to mention of medical bills and absence of property collateral.
Loan officer Maria Gomez was assigned to the application to begin the detailed evaluation and ensure timely processing of the case.
Initial review completed with focus on verifying applicant’s employment status and purpose of loan covering medical treatment costs.
Additional documents requested including medical bills, employer verification letter, and recent bank statements to support application.
Applicant has provided all requested documents promptly, including medical invoices and proof of income statements for review.
Credit check reports returned with a stable credit history but a few minor late payments noted in the last year.
Risk assessment indicates moderate risk due to recent late payments offset by steady employment and sufficient income.
A tailored loan offer was presented to the applicant with interest rate and repayment plan designed to accommodate medical expenses.
Applicant responded positively to the loan terms, expressing understanding and readiness to proceed with the offered repayment schedule.
The application was escalated to senior underwriter due to loan amount size exceeding initial officer’s approval limits.
Senior underwriter approved the loan application after thorough review, confirming financial viability and acceptable risk levels.
Loan amount was successfully disbursed to the applicant's designated bank account to cover the required medical expenses promptly.
Follow-up conducted to ensure applicant has received funds and offer assistance with any questions about repayment schedule or account management.
The loan application case was successfully closed after confirming that all funding and documentation processes were completed without issues.
